## Mortality Dataset Logistic Regression Model

```{r cars}
fit0 <- glm(
    formula = death_due_to_covid  ~ decades_old + gender + race + 
              adj_perc_bach_quar + adj_perc_insured_quar +
              adj_pop_density + adj_med_income +
              adj_time_days,
    family = binomial, 
    data = usable_cases
    )
summary(fit0)
```
